Changelog
=========

0.1.4 - 2011/02/22
------------------
* support for exact|substring|prefix search through
  the query() API

0.1.3 - 2011/02/22
------------------
* added generic query() API

0.1.2 - 2011/02/21
------------------
* implemented getItem() in a proper way

0.1.1 - 2011/02/18
------------------

* minor fixes
* documentation updated

0.1 - 2011/02/17
----------------

* Initial release
